name: Experience Unlimited
description: '''Experience Unlimited''' (also known as simply '''E.U.''') is a [[Washington, D.C.]]â€“based [[go-go]]/funk band that enjoyed its height of popularity in the 1980s and early 1990s.  Fronted by [[lead singer]]/[[bass guitarist|bassist]] Gregory "Sugar Bear" Elliot, the group has had a fluctuating membership over the years, but they have maintained a fairly loyal following.
